job_tasks.phrase: Engaging with clients to define requirements, provide recommendations, and ensure that our solutions meet their business needs
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to understanding client needs and aligning technical solutions with business requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: Use AI to accelerate the delivery of business intelligence solutions and significantly improve client satisfaction
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the strategic use of AI to achieve business objectives and improve client outcomes.

job_tasks.phrase: Building and enhancing data workflows using Alteryx
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of creating and improving data processing pipelines.

job_tasks.phrase: Data Visualization Creation: Producing Tableau dashboards
job_tasks.justification: While visualization is a output, the creation of dashboards often involves data preparation and structuring, fitting under data engineering.

soft_skills.phrase: Engaging with clients to define requirements, provide recommendations
ensure that our solutions meet their business needs
Use AI to accelerate the delivery of business intelligence solutions

classification.rationale: The job description heavily focuses on traditional business intelligence tools like Tableau and Alteryx, with only a brief mention of using AI to accelerate existing BI solutions. There is no indication of building, fine-tuning, or deploying generative AI models, nor core AI/ML engineering tasks.
